ancestries.name: Human
special_abilities: Versatile Heritage: Gain a general feat at 1st level
ancestries.description: Ambitious, adaptable, and diverse, humans are the most common ancestry in most parts of the world.

ancestries.name: Dwarf
special_abilities: Darkvision
Clan Dagger: You get one clan dagger of your clan for free
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with dwarven weapons
ancestries.description: These short and stocky defenders of mountain fortresses are often seen as stern and humorless.

ancestries.name: Elf
special_abilities: Low-Light Vision
Keen Senses: You become trained in Perception
Elven Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with elven weapons
ancestries.description: As an ancient people, elves have seen great change and have the perspective that can come only from watching the arc of history.

ancestries.name: Gnome
special_abilities: Low-Light Vision
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with gnome weapons
ancestries.description: Long ago, early gnome ancestors emigrated from the First World, realm of the fey.

ancestries.name: Goblin
special_abilities: Darkvision
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with goblin weapons
ancestries.description: The convoluted histories other people cling to don't interest goblins. These small folk live in the moment.

ancestries.name: Halfling
special_abilities: Keen Eyes: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with halfling weapons
ancestries.description: Claiming no place as their own, halflings control few settlements larger than villages.

ancestries.name: Orc
special_abilities: Darkvision
Orc Weapon Familiarity: You have familiarity with orc weapons
ancestries.description: Orcs are forged in the fires of violence and conflict, often from the moment they're born.

ancestries.name: Catfolk
special_abilities: Low-Light Vision
Land on Your Feet: You always land on your feet when you fall
ancestries.description: Curious and gregarious wanderers, catfolk combine features of felines and humanoids in both appearance and temperament.

ancestries.name: Kobold
special_abilities: Darkvision
Draconic Exemplar: You have a connection to a type of dragon
ancestries.description: Every kobold knows that their slight frame belies true, mighty draconic power.

ancestries.name: Lizardfolk
special_abilities: Claws: You have claws that can be used as weapons
Aquatic Adaptation: You can hold your breath longer and swim better
ancestries.description: Lizardfolk are consummate survivors, heirs to empires considered ancient even by the elves.
